general.shortDescription: Versatile professional with expertise in web design, entrepreneurship, marketing, logistics, and customer service, ready to enhance your team's capabilities.
general.extendedDescription: I am an experienced Web Designer and Software Engineer with expertise in WordPress, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, NodeJS, ExpressJS, SQL and PHP. My diverse background includes entrepreneurship, marketing, logistics, and customer service, making me a valuable asset for your team. Explore my portfolio today!

aboutMe.pageTitle:
From Business to Code
My Journey in Software Development and Creative Web Design

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Hello! My name is Abdullah Sögüt. I am 29 years old and was born in Bremen, Germany.

aspiration.title: Aspiration
aspiration.content: I aspire to bring my creative potential into the digital world as a passionate software developer. With a Bachelor of Science in Production Engineering, I have built a strong foundation in analytical thinking and problem-solving skills.

experience.title: Experience
experience.content: My passion for software development was born during my time as a business manager at an e-commerce company, where I gained extensive experience in web and graphic design using WordPress Elementor. With pride, I have successfully created websites such as:

evolution.title: Evolution
evolution.content: When I reached the limits of WordPress Elementor, my curiosity for programming was ignited. With enthusiasm, I delved deep into the world of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, NodeJS, ExpressJS, SQL and PHP to implement additional functionalities and expand my technical skills.

conclusion.title: Conclusion
conclusion.content: Therefore laying the foundation to develop projects, many of which I share on my GitHub. Examples include this portfolio site, which was created using only HTML, CSS, and Vanilla JavaScript.

degree2.diplomaDescription:
ALEXANDER VON HUMBOLDT HIGH SCHOOL BREMEN
2014 – 2015

jobs.title: Software Developer
responsibilities: Further development and improvement of ERP software using PowerBuilder 7 and PowerScript.
Working with SQL, e.g., creating and adapting queries for data integration and reports.
Automation of business processes through SQL-supported forms in PowerBuilder, dynamically providing data for evaluations, invoices, and delivery notes.
Setup and maintenance of ERP systems on servers and clients.

jobs.title: Portfolio Website – Self-Development
responsibilities: Development of this personal portfolio website with interactive elements showcasing my projects.

jobs.title: WEB DESIGN & Private Software Engineer
responsibilities: Design and maintenance of websites and e-commerce platforms using WordPress, complemented by custom extensions using HTML, CSS, PHP, and JavaScript.

jobs.title: PARTNER OF SOGEKING GBR
responsibilities: Expansion of online trade through various sales platforms – Amazon, EBAY, website.
Management of trademark and patent protection.
Creation of appealing website for user-friendly experience.
Implementation of data-driven marketing strategies for increased revenue.
Creation/editing of image and video material for professional and attractive product presentations.
Optimization of delivery processes for smooth shipping.
Independent handling of accounting and tax matters.
Focus on customer service for sustainable customer base.

jobs.title: FIELD WORKER FOR 2LOCATE
responsibilities: Acquisition of new customers and maintenance of existing customers through individual consultation and need-based solutions.

jobs.title: CUSTOMER ADVISOR FOR DEUTSCHE TELEKOM
responsibilities: Individual consultation and support for Telekom customers with inquiries and concerns.
Focus on quick solutions and high customer satisfaction.

further
information:
interestsList: Further education in the field of

mp3Player.description: My biggest project, which I worked on after 3 1/2 months of intensive learning in JavaScript, CSS, and HTML, is my MP3 player. This MP3 player is a powerful and user-friendly application. It allows you to play MP3 files, fast-forward and rewind, enable auto-play and enjoy shuffle playback. With its media library list, you can easily switch between your songs in the playlist, upload them, and enjoy.

typingSpeed.description: My Typing Speed App, developed after 2 1/2 months of learning JavaScript, CSS, and HTML, lets you test and improve your typing skills. It provides accurate speed and accuracy metrics, helping you become a faster and more precise typist.

toDo.description: My ToDo App is a simple and efficient task manager. Designed after 2 months of learning JavaScript, CSS, and HTML, it helps you organize your tasks, set priorities, and stay productive with ease.

timer.description: My Timer App, created after 1 1/2 months of mastering JavaScript, CSS, and HTML, offers precise timing capabilities. Use it for various purposes, from cooking to workouts, with reliability and accuracy.

clock.description: My Clock App is a straightforward timekeeping tool, crafted after 1 months of JavaScript, CSS, and HTML learning. It displays the time accurately, keeping you informed at a glance.

keyGenerator.description: My KeyGenerator Tool, born after 3 months of studying JavaScript, CSS, and HTML, generates secure and random keys for various purposes. Enhance your security with ease using this efficient utility.

eyesightTest.description: The EyeSight Test App is an interactive React project designed to test and improve vision focus. It features automatic input focus, visual feedback animations, and increasing difficulty with smaller font sizes. User preferences like theme and font size are saved in localStorage for a personalized experience. The app offers a smooth and engaging platform for eyesight testing.
